title: Firefox crasht telkens weer
content:
Sinds een paar dagen crasht Firefox telkens als ik Forge of Empires speel. Het tabblad gaat dan op zwart of de crash-pagina van Firefox verschijnt. Hetzelfde gebeurt dan ook soms bij andere open tabbladen, dan blijft het geluid wel, maar beeld is zwart of de crash-pagina verschijnt op alle tabbladen.

Ik wis telkens de cookies e.d., heb de veilige modus van Firefox gebruikt en opgefrist naar oorspronkelijke instellingen. Daarnaast heb ik AVG laten scannen.

Ik heb geen idee waar dit aan ligt. Al moet ik er bij vermelden, dat zo'n 1,5 week zoekopdrachten in Google soms helemaal niet reageert. Ook viel het me nu (pas) op dat in Firefox Instellingen bovenaan staat dat de "browser door uw organisatie wordt beheerd".

Hopelijk kunt u mij een oplossing bieden. Alvast bedankt,

Hendrik
creator: h.e.zijlstra

title: Linking Mozilla account on IPhone X to Mozilla on Dell Laptop
content:
I want to link my Firefox Account between my iPhone X Device and my Dell Laptop. I need to know how to do that in detail.

Note: I tried opening the menu and clicking sync and save, but I couldn’t see it on the menu, the same thing happened when I looked, as advised, when looking for Ready to scan; I couldn’t see it on the menu !

Kindly explain what should I do in clear step by step detail, as pertaining to these two devices which I am trying to link.

Thanks and my regards.
creator: sgsdkassis

title: Firefox does not navigate and looses custom configuration every time Windows is shut down and starts again.
content:
Every time I shut down Windows and start it again, Firefox looses all custom configuration and does not navigate on any site. Other browsers do it: Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge.

I have to go to Menu | Help | Technical Information and clear all of them AND I have to redo all my personalized configuration like: options, buttons, bars, tools and tabs, which I get from my backup (I use the extension: "Simple Tab Groups").

How to fix it? I use Firefox for decades and I have never had this issue.

Thank anyone for any enlightenment. Ivens
creator: ivensmg

title: Can't log in to American Airlines
content:
I cannot log in to my American Airlines account on Firefox, but login process works perfectly in Microsoft Edge. Why is that??

I am uploading the error page that Firefox displayed.
creator: karenrose28

title: How to recover files deleted fromthe dowloads menu.
content: Accidentally deleted a file downloaded to the Downloads folder when I intended to hit the Clear Downloads. If not recoverable, suggest moving the Delete away from Clear Downloads or require a confirmation before deleting.
creator: Russ.Plaisance

title: truekey not working
content: I had truekey working on this device, now it doesnt. still working on other devices
